WEFT 90.1 fm

listener-supported, volunteer operated, community radio since 1981

Support WEFT

We warmly welcome your support of any amount. Certain levels of support are eligable for gifts while supplies last after the most recent pledge drive.

  • $40 level: become a new member or renew your annual membership
  • $65 level: choose one of three gifts
  • $90.10 level: choose two of three gifts
  • $120 level: choose three of three gifts
  • $150 level: special long sleeve denim shirt with WEFT embroidered logo

The three mid-range gifts include:

WEFT ball cap

WEFT tote bag

WEFT tee shirt

Pledge your support online, by phone, by mail or in person.

1

 Donate online

We use PayPal to securely handle online transactions with your credit card, debit card, or PayPal account.

$40

Basic Membership Level

$65

Choose gift 1

$90.10

Choose gift 1
Choose gift 2

$120

Choose gift 1
Choose gift 2
Choose gift 3

$150

Choose size

Any other amount

For pledges $65 & up, we'll contact you about premiums

 
2

 Donate by phone

Call the station manager at 217-359-9338 to make your pledge over the phone.

 
3

 Donate by mail

Print & fill out our donation form and include it with your check. Make checks payable to WEFT, and mail them to:

WEFT
P.O. Box 1223
Champaign, IL 61824

 
4

 Donate in person

Stop by the station, located in downtown Champaign (map), and our station manager can take your pledge in person. We're located at:

113 North Market St.
Champaign, IL 61820

WEFT 90.1 fm · 113 N Market St, Champaign, IL 61820 · P.O. Box 1223, Champaign, IL 61824 · 217-359-9338 · StationManager@weft.org
